alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 9:53AM EST until November 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and additional ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, Lake George Saratoga region, southern Vermont and the northern Berkshires. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on untreated and elevated surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Some power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will transition to freezing rain by late this morning. Freezing rain will then change to plain rain as steady precipitation ends by early this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
